page.title: 12EDUCATION AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: Some of the many varied subjects taught at{Tuxford Comprehensive}school include English, Mathematics, Science, Art, Music, French, German, Drama, Rural Studies and Physical Education. Children continue their studies here until the statutory school leaving age of{16,}by which time many will have taken their{Ordinary}level {General Certificate of Education}or {Certificate of Secondary Education depending upon their ability.Some may remain to study{Advanced}level G.C.E. or{City and Guilds}qualifications. Further education can also be sought at Colleges and Universities if required, the nearest of these is {Newark Technical College,}which offers a wide choice of subjects, for active minds and bodies.
